attributes.action: Bring fourth a Monkey Government for the period of 2 weeks
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: A particular idea from the popular satirical news show "Have I Got News For You" seems to be a good idea.  It is the idea that England should be governed by Monkeys for 2 weeks.

reasons: Wording that needs to be amended, or is impossible to understand
Intended to be humorous, or has no point about government policy
